name: Crete: Become Hubris
description:
Become Icarus! Fly into the open sky and ignore your dad's prudent advice in this push-your-luck arcade game. Collect as many hubris points as you can by flying close to the sun - but be careful - your flight will get erratic the more you fly! You can only collect points by landing on the opposite island. 

Voice by Kevin Buchanan
Music by Origami_Repetik
Made in Godot
